The company is Doing Business As (DBA) . It is operating in the Industrials industry. As for the Business Description, Tokheim India Pvt. Ltd. is engaged in the manufacturing of fuel dispensing equipment. It offers fuel dispensers and pumps, retail automation systems, payment terminals, media devices, replacement parts and upgrade.

Tokheim India Pvt. Ltd. Company’s Board of Directors are of Tokheim India Pvt. Ltd. are Nalin Grover, Subrata Mahapatra, Alistair Graeme Johnston The appointment date of each of the members from the Board of Directors can be accessed here.

As for the financial overview of the company, in the previous financial year 2020, its Net Sales was 1,963.40 and Total Revenue was 1,999.60. After factoring in the Total Expenditure of 1,889.55, Tokheim India Pvt. Ltd. Company’s EBITDA was 110.05 with an EBITDA margin of 5.50. The company’s EBIT and PAT stood at 79.68 and 81.09 respectively. The resulting PAT was 81.09 with a PAT Margin of 4.06%. The Company had a Debt-to-Equity ratio of 0.00 and Current Ratio of 1.36.
